Require Import Rbase.
Require Import Rfunctions.
Require Import Ranalysis1.
Require Import R_sqrt.
Local Open Scope R_scope.

(**********)

forall h : R,
Rabs h <= 1 -> Rabs (sqrt (1 + h) - 1) <= Rabs h


forall h : R,
Rabs h <= 1 -> Rabs (sqrt (1 + h) - 1) <= Rabs h

  
h:R
H:Rabs h <= 1
0 <= 1 + h -> Rabs (sqrt (1 + h) - 1) <= Rabs h
h:R
H:Rabs h <= 1
0 <= 1 + h

  
h:R
H:Rabs h <= 1
H0:0 <= 1 + h
Rabs (sqrt (1 + h) - 1) <= Rabs (sqrt (1 + h)¬≤ - 1)
h:R
H:Rabs h <= 1
H0:0 <= 1 + h
Rabs (sqrt (1 + h)¬≤ - 1) <= Rabs h
h:R
H:Rabs h <= 1
0 <= 1 + h

  
h:R
H:Rabs h <= 1
H0:0 <= 1 + h
Hlt:h < 0
Rabs (sqrt (1 + h) - 1) <= Rabs (sqrt (1 + h)¬≤ - 1)

H0:0 <= 1 + h

h:R

H0:0 <= 1 + h

H0:0 <= 1 + h

sqrt is continuous in 1 
continuity_pt sqrt 1


continuity_pt sqrt 1

  
eps:R
H:eps > 0
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x /\ Rabs (x - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x - sqrt 1) < eps)

  
eps:R
H:eps > 0
alpha:=Rmin eps 1:R
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x /\ Rabs (x - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x - sqrt 1) < eps)

  
eps:R
H:eps > 0
alpha:=Rmin eps 1:R
alpha > 0 /\
(forall x : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x /\ Rabs (x - 1) < alpha ->
 Rabs (sqrt x - sqrt 1) < eps)

alpha:=Rmin eps 1:R
alpha > 0

forall x : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x /\ Rabs (x - 1) < alpha ->
Rabs (sqrt x - sqrt 1) < eps

  apply Rlt_le_trans with alpha;
    [ apply H2 | unfold alpha; apply Rmin_l ].
Qed.
sqrt is continuous forall x>0 
forall x : R, 0 < x -> continuity_pt sqrt x


forall x : R, 0 < x -> continuity_pt sqrt x

H:0 < x
continuity_pt sqrt 1 -> continuity_pt sqrt x

   Rabs (sqrt x0 - sqrt 1) < eps0)

   Rabs (sqrt x0 - sqrt x) < eps)

 D_x no_cond 1 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x0 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0

H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
sqrt x <> 0
x:R
H:0 < x

H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps * / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
H7:x = x0
0 < / sqrt x0
x:R
H:0 < x

   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps * / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
H7:x <> x0
True /\ 1 <> 1 + (x0 - x) / x
x:R

H0:forall eps0 : R,

  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps * / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
H7:x <> x0
Rabs (1 + (x0 - x) / x - 1) < alp_1

H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
sqrt x * (sqrt (1 + (x0 - x) / x) - sqrt 1) =
sqrt (x + (x0 - x)) - sqrt x
x:R
H:0 < x
H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x0 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
0 < eps / sqrt x

  
x:R
H:0 < x
H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps * / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
H7:x <> x0
H8:1 = 1 + (x0 - x) / x
H9:(x0 - x) * / x = 0
H10:/ x = 0
False

  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps * / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
H7:x <> x0
Rabs (1 + (x0 - x) / x - 1) < alp_1

 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0

H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x0 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
0 < eps / sqrt x

  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps * / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
H7:x <> x0
H8:D_x no_cond x x0
H9:Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
Rmin alpha x <= alpha
x:R

 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
sqrt x <> 0
x:R
H:0 < x

H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R

H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
x <> 0

  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x0 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
0 < eps / sqrt x

  
x:R
H:0 < x
H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R
H6:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
H7:D_x no_cond x x0
H8:- (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
Hlt:x0 - x < 0
- ((x0 - x) / x) + 0 <=
- ((x0 - x) / x) + ((x0 + - x) / x + 1)

H0:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x1 : R,
   D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp ->
   Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps0)
eps:R
H1:eps > 0
H2:0 < eps / sqrt x
alp_1:R
H3:alp_1 > 0 /\
(forall x1 : R,
 D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
 Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x)
H4:alp_1 > 0
H5:forall x1 : R,
D_x no_cond 1 x1 /\ Rabs (x1 - 1) < alp_1 ->
Rabs (sqrt x1 - sqrt 1) < eps / sqrt x
alpha:=alp_1 * x:R
x0:R

H7:D_x no_cond x x0
H8:- (x0 - x) < Rmin alpha x
Hlt:x0 - x < 0
x <> 0

  apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; apply sqrt_lt_R0; apply H.
Qed.
sqrt is derivable for all x>0 
forall x : R,
0 < x -> derivable_pt_lim sqrt x (/ (2 * sqrt x))


forall x : R,
0 < x -> derivable_pt_lim sqrt x (/ (2 * sqrt x))

H:0 < x
g:=fun h : R => sqrt x + sqrt (x + h):R -> R
derivable_pt_lim sqrt x (/ (2 * sqrt x))

  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alp ->
   Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps0)
eps:R
H3:0 < eps
alpha:R
H4:alpha > 0 /\
(forall x0 : R,
 D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
 Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps)
H5:alpha > 0
H6:forall x0 : R,
D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps
alpha1:=Rmin alpha x:R
H7:0 < alpha1
h:R
H8:h <> 0
H9:Rabs h < {| pos := alpha1; cond_pos := H7 |}
Rabs (/ (sqrt x + sqrt (x + h)) - / (2 * sqrt x)) <
eps

H1:g 0 <> 0
H2:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alp ->
   Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps0)
eps:R
H3:0 < eps
alpha:R
H4:alpha > 0 /\
(forall x0 : R,
 D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
 Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps)
H5:alpha > 0
H6:forall x0 : R,
D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
Rabs
  (/ (sqrt x + sqrt (x + x0)) -
   / (sqrt x + sqrt (x + 0))) < eps
alpha1:=Rmin alpha x:R
H7:0 < alpha1
h:R
H8:h <> 0
H9:Rabs h < {| pos := alpha1; cond_pos := H7 |}
True

H1:g 0 <> 0
H2:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alp ->
   Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps0)
eps:R
H3:0 < eps
alpha:R
H4:alpha > 0 /\
(forall x0 : R,
 D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
 Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps)
H5:alpha > 0
H6:forall x0 : R,
D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
Rabs
  (/ (sqrt x + sqrt (x + x0)) -
   / (sqrt x + sqrt (x + 0))) < eps
alpha1:=Rmin alpha x:R
H7:0 < alpha1
h:R
H8:h <> 0
H9:Rabs h < {| pos := alpha1; cond_pos := H7 |}
sqrt x + sqrt (x + 0) = 2 * sqrt x

(sqrt x + sqrt (x + h)) *
((sqrt (x + h) - sqrt x) / h)

H9:Rabs h < {| pos := alpha1; cond_pos := H7 |}
H10:0 <= x + h
H11:0 < sqrt x + sqrt (x + h)
1 =
(sqrt x + sqrt (x + h)) *
((sqrt (x + h) - sqrt x) / h)
x:R
H:0 < x

eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alp ->
   Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps0)

H7:0 < alpha1
h:R
H8:h <> 0
H9:Rabs h < {| pos := alpha1; cond_pos := H7 |}
0 <= x + h
x:R

g:=fun h : R => sqrt x + sqrt (x + h):R -> R

eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alp ->
   Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps0)

alpha1:=Rmin alpha x:R
H7:0 < alpha1
h:R
H8:h <> 0
H9:Rabs h < {| pos := alpha1; cond_pos := H7 |}
0 <= x + h
x:R
H:0 < x
g:=fun h : R => sqrt x + sqrt (x + h):R -> R
H0:continuity_pt g 0
H1:g 0 <> 0
H2:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alp ->
   Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps0)

0 <= x + h
x:R
H:0 < x
g:=fun h : R => sqrt x + sqrt (x + h):R -> R
H0:continuity_pt g 0
H1:g 0 <> 0
H2:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists alp : R,
  alp > 0 /\
  (forall x0 : R,
   D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alp ->
   Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps0)
eps:R
H3:0 < eps
alpha:R

(forall x0 : R,
 D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
 Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps)
H5:alpha > 0
H6:forall x0 : R,
D_x no_cond 0 x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - 0) < alpha ->
Rabs ((/ g)%F x0 - (/ g)%F 0) < eps
alpha1:=Rmin alpha x:R

  unfold plus_fct, fct_cte, id; rewrite Rplus_0_r; apply H.
Qed.

(**********)

forall x : R, 0 < x -> derivable_pt sqrt x


forall x : R, 0 < x -> derivable_pt sqrt x

  
x:R
H:0 < x
{l : R | derivable_pt_abs sqrt x l}

  
x:R
H:0 < x
derivable_pt_abs sqrt x (/ (2 * sqrt x))

  apply derivable_pt_lim_sqrt; assumption.
Qed.

(**********)

forall (x : R) (pr : 0 < x),
derive_pt sqrt x (derivable_pt_sqrt x pr) =
/ (2 * sqrt x)


forall (x : R) (pr : 0 < x),
derive_pt sqrt x (derivable_pt_sqrt x pr) =
/ (2 * sqrt x)

  
x:R
pr:0 < x
derive_pt sqrt x (derivable_pt_sqrt x pr) =
/ (2 * sqrt x)

  
x:R
pr:0 < x
derivable_pt_lim sqrt x (/ (2 * sqrt x))

  apply derivable_pt_lim_sqrt; assumption.
Qed.
We show that sqrt is continuous for all x>=0
Remark : by definition of sqrt (as extension of Rsqrt on |R), we could also show that sqrt is continuous for all x 
forall x : R, 0 <= x -> continuity_pt sqrt x


forall x : R, 0 <= x -> continuity_pt sqrt x

H0:0 < x
continuity_pt sqrt x

continuity_pt sqrt x

  (forall x0 : R,

   Rabs (sqrt x0 - sqrt x) < eps)

Rabs
  match Rcase_abs x0 with
  | left _ => 0
  | right a =>
      Rsqrt_def.Rsqrt
        {|
        nonneg := x0;
        cond_nonneg := Rge_le x0 0 a |}
  end < eps

0 <= sqrt x0

H:0 <= x
H0:0 = x \/ 0 > x
H1:0 = x
eps:R
H2:eps > 0
x0:R
H3:D_x no_cond x x0 /\ Rabs (x0 - x) < eps¬≤
H4:D_x no_cond x x0
H5:Rabs x0 < eps¬≤
Hgt:x0 >= 0
Heqs:Rcase_abs x0 = right Hgt

  elim (Rlt_irrefl _ (Rlt_le_trans _ _ _ H1 H)).
Qed.
